dcterms:creator: Department for Transport
dcterms:description: An extensive dataset encompassing reported collisions, casualties, and vehicles involvements from 1926 to 2022, providing insights into road traffic accidents in Great Britain.
dcterms:title: Road Traffic Accidents Dataset (collisions, casualties, and vehicles)

dcterms:creator: Sepp Hochreiter
JÃ¼rgen Schmidhuber
dcterms:description: A foundational paper introducing Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks, which are used for analyzing and predicting trends in road traffic accidents.
dcterms:title: LSTM Networks

dcterms:creator: Shaw-Pin Miaou
H Lum
dcterms:description: A dataset modeling vehicle accidents and their relationships with highway geometric design, providing insights into factors influencing road safety.
dcterms:title: Vehicle Accidents and Highway Geometric Design Relationships

dcterms:creator: James D. Hamilton
dcterms:description: A comprehensive text on time series analysis, providing methodologies that can be applied to analyze road traffic accident data.
dcterms:title: Time Series Analysis

dcterms:creator: Sima Siami-Namini
Neda Tavakoli
Akbar Siami Namin
dcterms:description: A study comparing the performance of LSTM and BiLSTM in forecasting time series, highlighting their effectiveness in predicting trends.
dcterms:title: LSTM Performance in Forecasting Time Series

dcterms:creator: Bing Yu
Haoteng Yin
Zhanxing Zhu
dcterms:description: A framework for traffic forecasting using spatio-temporal graph convolutional networks, providing insights into traffic dynamics.
dcterms:title: Spatio-temporal Graph Convolutional Networks for Traffic Forecasting

dcterms:creator: Junbo Deng
Hongzi Zhao
dcterms:description: A study on LSTM-based traffic flow prediction that addresses missing data, providing methodologies for handling incomplete datasets.
dcterms:title: LSTM-based Traffic Flow Prediction

dcterms:creator: Anders Lie
Anders Kullgren
Claes Tingvall
dcterms:description: A study examining the effectiveness of electronic stability control (ESC) in reducing real-life crashes and injuries.
dcterms:title: The Effectiveness of Electronic Stability Control (ESC)

dcterms:creator: Allan F. Williams
J. K. Wells
dcterms:description: A study on the role of enforcement programs in increasing seat belt use, providing insights into behavioral safety measures.
dcterms:title: The Role of Enforcement Programs in Increasing Seat Belt Use

dcterms:creator: Diane C. Thompson
Frederick P. Rivara
Robert S. Thompson
dcterms:description: A study assessing the effectiveness of bicycle safety helmets in preventing head injuries, providing insights into cyclist safety.
dcterms:title: Effectiveness of Bicycle Safety Helmets

dcterms:creator: Conor CO Reynolds
M. Anne Harris
Kay Teschke
Peter A. Cripton
Meghan Winters
dcterms:description: A review of literature on the impact of transportation infrastructure on bicycling injuries and crashes, providing insights into safety measures.
dcterms:title: The Impact of Transportation Infrastructure on Bicycling Injuries and Crashes

dcterms:creator: Transport Research Laboratory
dcterms:description: A report detailing incidents involving buses in road accidents, providing insights into public transport safety.
dcterms:title: Buses Involved in Road Accidents

dcterms:creator: Leo Aarts
Ingrid van Schagen
dcterms:description: A review examining the relationship between driving speed and the risk of road crashes, providing insights into speed management.
dcterms:title: Driving Speed and the Risk of Road Crashes
